tags.name: ef-item
tags.description:
Used as a basic building block to compose complex custom elements,
additionally it can be used by applications
to create simple menus or navigation panels.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description:
The text for the label indicating the meaning of the item.
By having both `label` and content, `label` always takes priority

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: If defined value can be `text`, `header` or `divider`

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Set the icon name from the ef-icon list

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Indicates that the item is selected

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Is the item part of a multiple selection

attributes.name: sub-label
attributes.description: The`subLabel` property represents the text beneath the label.

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: Specifies which element an item is bound to

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The content of this attribute represents the value of the item.

properties.name: label
properties.description:
The text for the label indicating the meaning of the item.
By having both `label` and content, `label` always takes priority

properties.name: type
properties.description: If defined value can be `text`, `header` or `divider`

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Set the icon name from the ef-icon list

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Indicates that the item is selected

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Is the item part of a multiple selection

properties.name: subLabel
properties.description: The`subLabel` property represents the text beneath the label.

properties.name: for
properties.description: Specifies which element an item is bound to

properties.name: highlightable
properties.description: Return true if the item can be highlighted. True if not disabled and type is Text

properties.name: isTruncated
properties.description: Getter returning if the label is truncated

properties.name: value
properties.description: The content of this attribute represents the value of the item.

slots.name: left
slots.description: Used to render the content on the left of the label.

slots.name: right
slots.description: Used to render the content on the right of the label.
